name: Obliteracy
description: Obliteracy is a word game set in a utopian future where energy is generated from language itself. Word-warriors pilot enormous mechanized robots in a tournament to prove themselves worthy of the title of Championâ€”and to earn the chance to craft the future of the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 64-bit Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Yes Additional Notes: Online play and some advanced features require network connection
